snippet: An unlikely performance from journeyman goalie Richard Bachman has the Vancouver Canucks thinking about a playoff push that seemed farfetched just a few days ago....

headline.main: Cuba’s Raul Castro Blasts Trump’s Mexican Wall and Trade Policy
headline.print_headline: Cuba’s Raul Castro Blasts Trump’s Mexican Wall and Trade Policy

lead_paragraph: An unlikely performance from journeyman goalie Richard Bachman has the Vancouver Canucks thinking about a playoff push that seemed farfetched just a few days ago.
